## Setup Working Directory and Libraries

```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
setwd("~/01-Master-Thesis/01-code-git/01-code/")
library(ncdf4)
```

## Read ERA-Interim-Datasets
```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

#' Einlesen der Daten mit ncdf4-Routinen
nc <- nc_open("../../a-ei-1deg-1979-2017-ztuv.nc")
u_ei <- ncvar_get(nc, "u")[,,,1:2] ## U-Wind-Komponente
v_ei <- ncvar_get(nc, "v")[,,,1:2] # V-Wind-Komponente
lon <- ncvar_get(nc, "longitude") # L채ngengrad
lat <- ncvar_get(nc, "latitude") # Breitengrad
lev <- ncvar_get(nc, "level") # Drucklevel
date_help <- ncvar_get(nc, "time")[1:2]
nc_close(nc); rm(nc)

#' Umschreiben der Zeitachse in Posix-Format
dts <- as.POSIXct(date_help * 3600, origin = "1900-01-01 00:00", tz = "UTC")
dts_month <- as.character(month(dts, label = TRUE))
dts_year <- year(dts)

#' Umrechnen der Matrizen von Pazifik- auf Europazentrisches Gitter -----------------------------------------
#' [0,360] -> [-180,180]
#'
lon_help <- lon - 180
# lon[1]; lon_help[97];
# lon[1]; lon_help[181];
u_ei <- u_ei[c(181:360, 1:180),,,]
dimnames(u_ei) <- list(lon_help, lat, lev, dts)
v_ei <- v_ei[c(181:360, 1:180),,,]
dimnames(v_ei) <- list(lon_help, lat, lev, dts)
lon <- lon_help


```


## Read ERA-40-Datasets and extend them by missing levels (compared to ERA-Interim)
```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

#' Einlesen der Daten mit ncdf4-Routinen
nc <- nc_open("../../a-e4-1deg-1958-1978-ztuv.nc")
u_e4 <- ncvar_get(nc, "u") ## U-Wind-Komponente
v_e4 <- ncvar_get(nc, "v") # V-Wind-Komponente
lon_e4 <- ncvar_get(nc, "longitude") # L채ngengrad
lat_e4 <- ncvar_get(nc, "latitude") # Breitengrad
lev_e4 <- ncvar_get(nc, "level") # Drucklevel
date_help_e4 <- ncvar_get(nc, "time")
nc_close(nc); rm(nc)

#' Umschreiben der Zeitachse in Posix-Format
dts_e4 <- as.POSIXct(date_help_e4 * 3600, origin = "1900-01-01 00:00", tz = "UTC")
dts_month_e4 <- as.character(month(dts_e4, label = TRUE))
dts_year_e4 <- year(dts_e4)

#' Umrechnen der Matrizen von Pazifik- auf Europazentrisches Gitter -----------------------------------------
#' [0,360] -> [-180,180]
#'
lon_help_e4 <- lon_e4 - 180
# lon[1]; lon_help[97];
u_e4 <- u_e4[c(181:360, 1:180),,,]
dimnames(u_e4) <- list(lon_help_e4, lat_e4, lev_e4, dts_e4)
v_e4 <- v_e4[c(181:360, 1:180),,,]
dimnames(v_e4) <- list(lon_help_e4, lat_e4, lev_e4, dts_e4)
lon_e4 <- lon_help_e4


```


## Putting together ERA-40- and ERA-Interim-Datasets
```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


dts <- c(dts_e4, dts)

u <- 
  abind(abind(array(u_e4[,,1,], dim = c(360, 91, 1, 252)), 
              array(dim = c(360,91,1,252)),
              array(u_e4[,,2,], dim = c(360, 91, 1, 252)), 
              array(dim = c(360,91,1,252)),

              array(u_e4[,,4,], dim = c(360, 91, 1, 252)),

#' Indizes der Matrizen f체r sp채tere Verarbeitung
```

## Save Dataset as New ncdf-file
```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
## Dimensions
dimx <- ncdim_def(name = "longitude", units = "degrees_east", vals = lon)
dimy <- ncdim_def(name = "latitude", units = "degrees_north", vals = lat)
dimz <- ncdim_def(name = "air_pressure", units = "millibars", vals = lev, 
                  longname = "pressure_level")
dimt <- ncdim_def(name = "time", units = "hours since 1900-01-01 00:00:0.0", 
                  vals = date_help, calendar = "gregorian")

## Missing Value
mv <- -32767

## Variables
var_u <- ncvar_def(name = "eastward_wind", units = "m S**-1", 
                   dim = list(dimx, dimy, dimz, dimt), missval = mv, 
                   longname = "U component of wind", prec = "float")
var_v <- ncvar_def(name = "northward_wind", units = "m S**-1", 
                   dim = list(dimx, dimy, dimz, dimt), missval = mv, 
                   longname = "V component of wind", prec = "float")

## Creating nc-file
nc <- nc_create(filename = "test.nc", vars = list(var_u, var_v))

## Adding Data to file
ncvar_put(nc = nc, varid = var_u, vals = u)
ncvar_put(nc, varid = var_v, vals = u)
nc_close(nc)
```
